item.title: U.S. tariffs take center stage but China and the EU are quietly clashing
item.description: Trade tensions between the Beijing and Brussels have long been simmering, but now appear to be heating up.

item.title: Trump's 50% Brazil tariff stretches emergency powers already facing court challenge
item.description: Critics say the tariff on Brazil could further erode the Trump administration's credibility as it pursues an aggressive trade agenda.

item.title: Trump loses appeal of $5 million E. Jean Carroll sexual abuse, defamation verdict
item.description: President Donald Trump was found liable for defaming Carroll in another case related to her claim of being sexually assaulted by him in the mid-1990s.

item.title: White House accuses Powell of mismanaging Federal Reserve, citing headquarters renovation
item.description: President Donald Trump has repeatedly called on Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell to slash interest rates.

item.title: Trump administration launches probe of DEI policy at George Mason University
item.description: The probe is based on a complaint by George Mason University professors who allege that personnel decisions underrepresented groups.
